summary: Add several armor sets and a dragon to the game.
descriptionHtml:
You should consider this release a “work in progress”. There are still few things I want to add but if I wanted to wait to implement them, it would probably take months before an actual release(knowing myself lol). It’s a lot of work and free time is a scarce resource.

[color=#ff0000][u]Valkyrie Armor (FEMALE ONLY)

[/u][/color]Add a new set of armor and weapons (there are enchanted and normal version of the weapon and shield) based on Norse mythology. It is Female only.

[color=#00ffff][b][i]Where to find[/i][/b]:[/color] 
In a chest located at the Silent moons camp (check picture). The armor and weapons can be forged (and tempered) under the Steel category and require the advanced armor perk.

[color=#00ffff][i]Things left to be done[/i]:[/color] 

- Add physics to the cape and braids
- Add Wings and robe accessories with physics
- Add weight slider support
[youtube]_Mic1IJ-1H0[/youtube]


[color=#ff0000][u]DragonLord Armor (MALE ONLY)

[/u][/color]Add a new set of armor and weapons (there are enchanted and normal version of the weapon and shield). People who are fan of Berserk and dark souls might like this one.

[color=#00ffff]Where to find:[/color]
In a chest located at the Silent moons camp (check picture). The armor and weapons can be forged (and tempered) under the Dragon category (armor)

[color=#00ffff]Things left to be done:[/color] 
- Add physics to the Helmet plume and armored robe (some clipping going on with the armored robe)
- Add a ragged cape accessory with physics
- Add weight slider support

[color=#ff0000][u]Nightingale Prime remastered (MALE AND FEMALE)

[/u][/color]Add a new set of armor (it is not a replacement) belonging to the Nightingales. It’s a remaster of the mod of the same name I released years ago. [color=#ffff00]It’s an entirely new mesh and textures[/color]( I hate it when people call this kind of extensive work "re-texture" lol). You can compare it to the original Nightingale armor and see the differences quite easily. The armor set has an increased rating and similar enchantments (you can still disenchant them if they are not to your liking).

[color=#00ffff]Where to find:
[/color]In a chest located at near the Nightingale Hall entrance (check picture). The armor can be forged (and tempered) under the Misc category. It will require an original nightingale armor piece (at level 32+) as one of the components.

[color=#00ffff]Things left to be done: [/color]
- Add physics to the cape
- Add proper unmasked cowls. I’ve already started to create those (they will appear in the forge) but they are not meant to be used yet. (Too much clipping and I’m not even going to talk about non humanoid races…). You can still add them for testing via the console command. Just type "help Prime" and they will be listed.
- Add weight slider support

[u][b][color=#ff0000]Jormungandr Dragon [/color]
[/b][/u]
This mod add a summonable dragon inspired from Norse Mythology. It has 2 attacks : 
- Wildfire/FoxFire Breath: Green fire which burn longer and cause more damage than normal one. It tend to use more this attack against other dragons.
- Wolfsbane : Purple Ball of ice and poison hitting a large area

[youtube]2LjjHAsdAL4[/youtube]

[color=#00ffff]Where to find:[/color]
In Whiterun. 1 conjuration spell tome and 1 book (containing the myth of jormungandr) with the same cover at the base of the Talos statue next to the snake (check the pics). Requirements: Conjuration apprentice level (again yeah... i didn't want to give people too many hassles)

[color=#ffff00]Installation: To install Just extract the contents (including folders) of this rar file into your Skyrim game folder. Comes with an esp file you can check and uncheck in the launch menu.[/color]

[color=#ff0000][u]IMPORTANT UPDATE [/u][/color]
I've released Hotfix updates for the 3 armors and I STRONGLY SUGGEST you to download them AFTER you've downloaded the main files. They are just esp files, you still need the main files.





[youtube]XbmoNREpku4[/youtube]
[youtube]d3eLjDRYRfA[/youtube]
[youtube]-FBzOpGkQ3E[/youtube]
[youtube]r3a1jTl34F0[/youtube]
author: Zerofrost Satyr
